Lorenz curve data

Source: R/blr-plots-data.R
blr_prep_lorenz_data.Rd

Data for generating Lorenz curve.

blr_prep_lorenz_data(model, data = NULL, test_data = FALSE)

Arguments

model

An object of class glm.
data

A tibble or data.frame.
test_data

Logical; TRUE if data is test data and FALSE if training data.

Examples

model <- glm(honcomp ~ female + read + science, data = hsb2,
             family = binomial(link = 'logit'))
data <- model$data
blr_prep_lorenz_data(model, data, FALSE)
#> # A tibble: 12 x 2
#>    cum_0s_per cum_1s_per
#>         <dbl>      <dbl>
#>  1     0           0    
#>  2     0.0408      0.264
#>  3     0.0884      0.509
#>  4     0.156       0.698
#>  5     0.245       0.830
#>  6     0.361       0.887
#>  7     0.476       0.943
#>  8     0.605       0.962
#>  9     0.728       1    
#> 10     0.864       1    
#> 11     1           1    
#> 12     1           1
